post:
UltraVPS is a brand of Bradler & Krantz GmbH Co KG. Founded in 1999 and headquarted in Bochum, Germany, our company is one of the most established European hostng providers. With our new brand we provide high-performance, enterprise-grade Virtual Servers for a very affordable price.

- Control panel: SolusVM
- Server location: Duesseldorf, Germany
- Own multi-redundant network AS29141  
Transit: 10G Level3, 10G NTT, 10G Cogent, 10G Deutsche Telekom  
Peering: 10G AMS-IX, 1G ECIX Duesseldorf
- Test IPv4 address: 31.170.105.2

**UltraXen15**

- 512 MB RAM
- 1 CPU Core
- 15 GB RAID-10 Storage
- 500 GB Monthly Transfer
- 1 IPv4 address
- /64 IPv6 subnet
- Contract term: 6 months

_2 EUR per month incl. 19% VAT (1.68 EUR/1.89 USD excl. VAT)_

**UltraXen30**

- 1 GB RAM
- 1 CPU Core
- 30 GB RAID-10 Storage
- 1 TB Monthly Transfer
- 1 IPv4 address
- /64 IPv6 subnet
- Contract term: 6 months

_3 EUR per month incl. 19% VAT (2.52 EUR/2.84 USD excl. VAT)_

**UltraXen50**

- 2 GB RAM
- 2 CPU Cores
- 50 GB RAID-10 Storage
- 1 TB Monthly Transfer
- 1 IPv4 address
- /64 IPv6 subnet
- Contract term: 3 months

_6 EUR per month incl. 19% VAT (5.04 EUR/5.69 USD excl. VAT)_


[>> Order now! <<](https://www.ultravps.eu/en/order/order.pl?cat=vserver_ultra)

Do you have any questions? Pleasse do not hesitate to drop us a mail at info@ultravps.eu.
